import React from 'react'; import Flippy, { FrontSide, BackSide } from 'react-flippy'; const Card = ({ name, email, phone, website, company, id }) => { return (

{name}

{email}

Contact Information

Phone:

{phone}

Company:

{company}

GitHub LinkedIn
); } export default Card; // className = 'tc bg-light-red dib br3 pa3 ma2 grow bw2 shadow-5'
